replies.msg:
Few have managed to polarise their public like this fellow over the years, as he has switched between the codes and teams to compile an extraordinary sporting resume. He has excelled in rugby, rugby league and, to a lesser degree, boxing. He has won NRL and Super Rugby titles, he has played for the Kiwis and compiled a decade-long 57-test career as an All Black in which he has won two World Cups and has been in pursuit of a remarkable threepeat here in Japan.

At 34 he has also matured into a quite special person. A devout Muslim, he has become a highly respected leader in his community in New Zealand. In the wake of the mosque shooting massacre in Christchurch, he was vociferous and prominent in the demanding healing process that unfolded.
But that's not all. He is a committed family man, with a wife, three children and fourth on the way. He has embraced the benefits of education and ticked off a late-in-life degree to practise what he preaches and is prominent among a group of All Blacks who lead the discussion around mental health.

Williams has become a beloved team-mate, both at the Blues and All Blacks, where he excels as a role model for the younger generation. Not only do they see a clean-living, family man committed to his religion, but a disciplined trainer who takes no short-cuts in the pursuit of his sporting success

replies.msg:
巴基斯坦個概念係30年代有個人9up出黎
當年無人理
當印度獨立係遲早都要發生
英國要一個地方係印度獨立後做基地對付蘇聯
如果印度無分治就唔駛諗
仲有國大黨班印度教徒係二戰前選舉大勝飛起回伊斯蘭教徒
伊斯蘭教徒就認為自己要一個獨立國家
而且伊斯蘭教班人全力支持英國打2戰
所以就整個分治出黎
之後幾十年都係西方盟友
蘇聯解體後
巴國一早俾晒錢買f16
但美國見唔駛再理巴國
貨又唔俾錢又唔退
係911要打阿富汗先發貨

當年有人9up巴基斯坦個概念出黎都成事
真係乜都有可能
